mapper.select: SELECT A.ID ACCOUNT_ID, A.NAME, A.AUTH, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.ID = T.ACCOUNT_ID THEN 1 END) TOTAL, COUNT(CASE WHEN T.STATUS = '완료' AND A.ID = T.ACCOUNT_ID THEN 1 END) COMPLETED, COUNT(CASE WHEN T.STATUS != '완료' AND A.ID = T.ACCOUNT_ID THEN 1 END) INCOMPLETED FROM ACCOUNT A, TASK T WHERE T.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} GROUP BY (A.ID, A.NAME, A.AUTH) ORDER BY A.ID DESC
